V.iii.4.A.3.d
.
Relationship Between Upper and Lower Respiratory Tract Infections
There may be a close relationship between disease of the upper respiratory tract and a subsequently-developing chronic process in the lower respiratory tract, especially in the bronchi.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - Respiratory Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A
